articles.author: Benzinga India Staff
articles.title: Pine Labs Reportedly Wants To Go Public At $6B Valuation, Almost Double Paytm's Size - Benzinga India
articles.description: Pine Labs, a leading digital payments provider in Asia, is reportedly considering a $1 billion (around ₹8,300 crore) IPO in India. This move comes as investor interest in the Indian stock market continues to surge.
